title: Space Teens
description: Two average Canadian teenagers solve crimes in space using math. Robots, beavers, and quadratic equations!
quote: Great job using long division to catch that space burglar, eh!
altHero: Robin Sparkles and Jessica Glitter in 90s outfits stand on their spaceship talking to a hologram Alan Thicke
alt3: Robin and Jessica standing with hockey sticks
alt4: the gang playing with beaver puppets and logs of wood
